subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] woohoo perfect signal again

full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0120_01C68F2D.68BAA300

	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Sometimes, they are willing to manipulate sound to form messages.  Remember=
 we are all energy, sound is also energy.  Energy is easy to manipulate.

F=
rank correct me if I'm wrong here.  I think Franks file that he sent was ma=
nipulated on the spot.  Mine is a bit different.  They some how saved up th=
e sound energy and used it at the end of the recording where no sound was p=
roduced from my computer speakers.  I like to think evp is formed from soun=
ds in our environment.  It is one of the main reasons why background sound =
such as white noise helps evp experimenters so much.

The way I got that ev=
p message was to play the german broadcast on my computer.  I had the volum=
e way down on my speakers, so it was just barely audible.  Because I have m=
y recorder on conference it still picked up the sound quite easily. I'm goi=
ng to take it off conference for the next session, because the messages com=
e through clearer that way.

I hope that helps

Jody

  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: Amy Swanson 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tues=
day, June 13, 2006 7:34 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] woohoo perfect signal a=
gain



  ok
  sooooooo
  what the heck?
  you guys are using radio i get? =
whats that mean? lol
  and what do you do with the foreign languge? to get =
the evp how?
  HA HA HA
  IN other words i have no clue what you guys are d=
oing and how
  does ne1 have the time to exlain from the beging the whole p=
rocess?

  amy

  Jody Cupp <bigrig309@...> wrote:
    This is what I u=
sed to get the last evp I sent through. :)


      ----- Original Message -=
---- 
      From: Jody Cupp 
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent:=
 Tuesday, June 13, 2006 6:35 PM
      Subject: [EVP-ITC] woohoo perfect sig=
nal again


      Frank,
      your post reminded me of that method.  I lik=
e to use a broadcast from internet radio.

      Notice the man says "you n=
eed stop coming in and out like that" Bran was coming in and out of the hou=
se while I was recording.  Then the next voice is not even on the broadcast=
.  he says "perfect signal again" woo hoo!

        ----- Original Message =
----- 
        From: Sumption Frank 
        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
 =
       Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2006 5:59 PM
        Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] =
Here's a voice from the 5th.


         This is one voice that was trying t=
o assert my identity. This was gotten by using a foreign  language as the r=
aw audio in 2002. The foreign language method is tuning in a non English st=
ation on short wave, I like French, German, and even Chinese. Then I announ=
ce I'm doing an EVP recording and record using the built in mic on a casset=
te deck.  
         Frank




  http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/

  L=
ON3_S7AR  YAHOO MESENGER ID
